name: Snow Light
description: In a close futuristic world, follow Snow Light a professional of espionage missions, and travel all over the globe to places such as Turkmenistan, Russia and England.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is like buying a cheeseburger on McD. you expect alot but it looks meh
